Name: loan_status
Encoding: Fully Paid = 1 / Charged Off, Default, Late(31d~) = 0
English Description: Current status of the loan

Name: int_rate
English Description: Interest Rate on the loan

Name: emp_title
English Description: The job title supplied by the Borrower when applying for the loan.*
Korean Description: 대출 신청시 차용자가 제공 한 직책 *

Name: emp_length
English Description: Employment length in years. Possible values are between 0 and 10 where 0 means less than one year and 10 means ten or more years.

Name: home_ownership
English Description: The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration or obtained from the credit report. Our values are: RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER
Korean Description: 주택 소유 상태(렌트, 소유, 모기지, 기타)

Name: annual_inc
English Description: The self-reported annual income provided by the borrower during registration.

Name: verification_status
English Description: Indicates if income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified

Name: issue_d
English Description: The month which the loan was funded

Name: loan_amnt
English Description: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower. If at some point in time, the credit department reduces the loan amount, then it will be reflected in this value.

Name: desc
English Description: Loan description provided by the borrower

Name: purpose
English Description: A category provided by the borrower for the loan request.

Name: dti
English Description: A ratio calculated using the borrower’s total monthly debt payments on the total debt obligations, excluding mortgage and the requested LC loan, divided by the borrower’s self-reported monthly income.

Name: delinq_2yrs
English Description: The number of 30+ days past-due incidences of delinquency in the borrower's credit file for the past 2 years
Korean Description: 지난 2 년간 연체 30일 이상 발생 횟수

Name: inq_last_6mths
English Description: The number of inquiries in past 6 months (excluding auto and mortgage inquiries)
Korean Description: 지난 6 개월 간 신용관련 문의 건수 (자동차, 모기지 제외)

Name: pub_rec
English Description: Number of derogatory public records

Name: revol_bal
English Description: Total credit revolving balance

Name: revol_util
English Description: Revolving line utilization rate, or the amount of credit the borrower is using relative to all available revolving credit.
Korean Description: 리볼빙 이용률, 차용자가 사용하는 리볼빙 크레딧 금액

Name: total_acc
English Description: The total number of credit lines currently in the borrower's credit file

Name: initial_list_status
English Description: The initial listing status of the loan. Possible values are – W, F
Korean Description: 대출의 초기 리스팅 상태(W: 전체, F: 부분)

Name: acc_now_delinq
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: The number of accounts on which the borrower is now delinquent.

Name: addr_state
English Description: The state provided by the borrower in the loan application
Korean Description: 대출 신청서에 차용인이 제공 한 국가

Name: all_util
English Description: Balance to credit limit on all trades

Name: annual_inc_joint
English Description: The combined self-reported annual income provided by the co-borrowers during registration
Korean Description: 등록 중 공동 차용자가 제공 한 자체보고 된 연간 소득

Name: application_type
English Description: Indicates whether the loan is an individual application or a joint application with two co-borrowers

Name: collection_recovery_fee
Reason for removal: not provided information on loan application
English Description: post charge off collection fee

Name: collections_12_mths_ex_med
Reason for removal: not provided information on loan application
English Description: Number of collections in 12 months excluding medical collections

Name: dti_joint
English Description: A ratio calculated using the co-borrowers' total monthly payments on the total debt obligations, excluding mortgages and the requested LC loan, divided by the co-borrowers' combined self-reported monthly income
Korean Description: 모기지 및 요청 된 LC 대출을 제외하고 총 차입금에 대한 공동 차용자의 월별 총 지불액을 공동 차용자의 결합 된 자기보고 월 소득으로 나눈 값

Name: earliest_cr_line
English Description: The month the borrower's earliest reported credit line was opened
Korean Description: 차용자의 최초보고 크레딧 라인이 개설 된 월

Name: funded_amnt
English Description: The total amount committed to that loan at that point in time.
Korean Description: 해당 시점에 대출에 투입된 총 금액.

Name: funded_amnt_inv
English Description: The total amount committed by investors for that loan at that point in time.
Korean Description: 해당 시점에 해당 대출에 대해 투자자들이 투입한 총 금액.

Name: id
English Description: A unique LC assigned ID for the loan listing.
Korean Description: 대출 목록에 대해 고유 한 LC 할당 ID.

Name: il_util
English Description: Ratio of total current balance to high credit/credit limit on all install acct
Korean Description: 모든 설치 공사에 대한 높은 신용 / 신용 한도 대비 총 현재 잔고 비율

Name: grade
English Description: LC assigned loan grade

Name: inq_fi
English Description: Number of personal finance inquiries

Name: installment
English Description: The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates.
Korean Description: 대출이 시작된 경우 차용자가 지불해야하는 월별 지불액

Name: inq_last_12m
English Description: Number of credit inquiries in past 12 months
Korean Description: 지난 12 개월 간의 신용 조회 건수

Name: last_credit_pull_d
English Description: The most recent month LC pulled credit for this loan

Name: last_pymnt_amnt
Reason for removal: not provided information on loan application
English Description: Last total payment amount received

Name: last_pymnt_d
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: Last month payment was received

Name: max_bal_bc
English Description: Maximum current balance owed on all revolving accounts
Korean Description: 모든 회전 계정에서 최대 현재 잔액

Name: member_id
English Description: A unique LC assigned Id for the borrower member.
Korean Description: 차용 회원의 고유 LC 할당 ID입니다.

Name: mths_since_last_delinq
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: The number of months since the borrower's last delinquency.
Korean Description: 차용인의 마지막 연체 이후 개월 수.

Name: mths_since_last_major_derog
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: Months since most recent 90-day or worse rating

Name: mths_since_last_record
English Description: The number of months since the last public record.
Korean Description: 최종 공개 기록 이후 개월 수.

Name: mths_since_rcnt_il
English Description: Months since most recent installment accounts opened
Korean Description: 가장 최근의 할부 계좌가 개설 된 이후의 달

Name: next_pymnt_d
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: Next scheduled payment date

Name: open_acc
English Description: The number of open credit lines in the borrower's credit file.

Name: open_acc_6m
English Description: Number of open trades in last 6 months
Korean Description: 최근 6 개월 동안의 미결 거래 횟수

Name: open_il_12m
English Description: Number of installment accounts opened in past 12 months
Korean Description: 지난 12 개월 동안 개설 된 할부 계좌 수

Name: open_il_24m
English Description: Number of installment accounts opened in past 24 months
Korean Description: 지난 24 개월 동안 개설 된 할부 계좌 수

Name: open_il_6m
English Description: Number of currently active installment trades

Name: open_rv_12m
English Description: Number of revolving trades opened in past 12 months
Korean Description: 지난 12 개월 동안 개설 된 회전 거래 수

Name: open_rv_24m
English Description: Number of revolving trades opened in past 24 months
Korean Description: 지난 24 개월 동안 개설 된 회전 거래 수

Name: out_prncp
Reason for removal: not provided information on loan application
English Description: Remaining outstanding principal for total amount funded
Korean Description: 후원 된 총 금액에 대한 미납 된 원금

Name: out_prncp_inv
Reason for removal: not provided information on loan application
English Description: Remaining outstanding principal for portion of total amount funded by investors
Korean Description: 투자자가 자금을 조달 한 부분의 잔액이 남아 있음.

Name: policy_code
English Description:
publicly available policy_code=1
new products not publicly available policy_code=2
Korean Description:
publicly available policy_code = 1
공개적으로 사용 가능하지 않은 신제품 policy_code = 2

Name: pymnt_plan
English Description: Indicates if a payment plan has been put in place for the loan

Name: recoveries
Reason for removal: not provided information on loan application
English Description: post charge off gross recovery

Name: sub_grade
English Description: LC assigned loan subgrade

Name: term
English Description: The number of payments on the loan. Values are in months and can be either 36 or 60.

Name: title
English Description: The loan title provided by the borrower

Name: tot_coll_amt
English Description: Total collection amounts ever owed

Name: tot_cur_bal
Reason for removal: dependent to other variables of repayment ability
English Description: Total current balance of all accounts

Name: total_bal_il
English Description: Total current balance of all installment accounts
Korean Description: 모든 할부 계좌의 총 현재 잔액

Name: total_cu_tl
English Description: Number of finance trades

Name: total_pymnt
Reason for removal: not provided information on loan application
English Description: Payments received to date for total amount funded

Name: total_pymnt_inv
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: Payments received to date for portion of total amount funded by investors
Korean Description: 투자자가 자금을 조달 한 총액의 일부분에 대해 현재까지 수령 한 지급액

Name: total_rec_int
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: Interest received to date

Name: total_rec_late_fee
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: Late fees received to date

Name: total_rec_prncp
Reason for removal: unclear data collection date from LC
English Description: Principal received to date

Name: total_rev_hi_lim
English Description: Total revolving high credit/credit limit
Korean Description: 총 회전 높은 신용 한도 / 신용 한도

Name: url
English Description: URL for the LC page with listing data.

Name: verification_status_joint
English Description: Indicates if the co-borrowers' joint income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified
Korean Description: 공동 차용인의 공동 수입이 LC로 검증되었는지, 검증되지 않았는지, 수입원이 확인되었는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

Name: zip_code
English Description: The first 3 numbers of the zip code provided by the borrower in the loan application.
Korean Description: 대출 신청서에 차용자가 제공 한 우편 번호의 처음 3 자리 숫자입니다.
